original_title: Broadway Theatre Archive: Guests of the Nation
overview: Directed by John Desmond, this politically charged drama centers on the complex relationship between a pair of British soldiers and the two Irish Republican Army insurgents guarding them in a remote farmhouse owned by a spirited widow. Frank Converse and Estelle Parsons turn in outstanding performances in this engrossing small-screen adaptation of Frank O'Connor's acclaimed short story set in 1921.
title: Broadway Theatre Archive: Guests of the Nation
